ch.nolix.system.client

Class ContextApplication<CL extends Client<CL>,CO>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.bases.NamedElement
      • ch.nolix.system.client.Application<CL>
        • ch.nolix.system.client.ContextApplication<CL,CO>
  • Type Parameters:
    CL - - The type of the clients of a context application.
    CO - - The type of the context of a context application.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Named
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatabaseApplication

    public class ContextApplication<CL extends Client<CL>,CO>
extends Application<CL>
    A context application is an application with a context.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
